title: Conjecture: the set of prime numbers is supernatural
abstract:
Prime numbers are fascinating by the way they appear in the set of natural
numbers. Despite several results enlighting us about their repartition, the set
of prime numbers is often informally qualified as misterious. In the present
paper, we introduce a formalism allowing to state a formal conjecture: the set
of prime numbers is supernatural. Our conjecture has no analog in the existing
literature. We explain that this conjecture is expected to be a hard challenge
for any kind of intelligence. However it is really natural and even seems very
close to be canonical.
